CREATE YOUR PERFECT DRESS

no more compromising style or fit

Choose your favourite silhouette, change the neckline, sleeves or skirt. Choose the colour of the fabric and details like a belt or faux-leather trim.

You can then decide whether our unique standard sizing model (based on 3D body scanning) is right for you or whether you want us to create a bespoke pattern on your measurements.

CHOOSE YOUR FAVOURITE SILHOUETTE

CHANGE THE COLOUR

CHANGE THE STYLING

CHOOSE 1 OF 3 SIZE OPTIONS

  1. AURZA standard sizes provide a fabulous fit due to the fact we have created our patterns in 3D and based them on a body that reflects real women (having used 3D body scanning). We have also added just the right amount of stretch into our fabrics to maximise comfort and ensure a flexibility of fit for different body shapes. For these reasons we do not use a typical country specific size chart but have labelled our sizes 1-8 as our sizes are unique to us.
  2. Mix and match tops and skirts for those that want a separates look or have very different top and bottom body shapes.
  3. Custom sizing where you provide your measurements (with our guidance) and we will adapt our patterns or make a bespoke pattern just for you depending on the information you give us.
